title: The Harmonic Protector: The Adventures of David Evans
summary: Over one week, 75-year-old David Evans uses his musical talents and negotiation skills to stop a supernatural threat in his community, restoring peace and harmony.
summaryGerman: Über eine Woche hinweg nutzt der 75-jährige David Evans seine musikalischen Talente und Verhandlungsfähigkeiten, um eine übernatürliche Bedrohung in seiner Gemeinde zu stoppen und Frieden und Harmonie wiederherzustellen.
summaryDutch: Gedurende één week gebruikt de 75-jarige David Evans zijn muzikale talenten en onderhandelingsvaardigheden om een bovennatuurlijke bedreiging in zijn gemeenschap te stoppen, waardoor vrede en harmonie worden hersteld.
summaryFrench: Pendant une semaine, David Evans, 75 ans, utilise ses talents musicaux et ses compétences en négociation pour arrêter une menace surnaturelle dans sa communauté, restaurant la paix et l'harmonie.

story.text: David Evans starts his week thrilled when a mysterious melody plays in his dreams, hinting at a hidden message.
Discovering that the melody corresponds to an ancient lore, David starts to research more about its origins and potential dangers.
Contacts in the music world aid David in decrypting the melody's content, leading him to understand it's a prayer to calm a restless spirit.
Using his negotiation skills, David convenes a meeting with spiritual leaders and musicians to discuss a plan of action.
David leads the group in a powerful, harmonious performance designed to appease the spirit, weaving his arrangement into their playing.
The restless spirit responds! It appears during the performance, sharing its tale of unrequited love and loss which has trapped it on this plane.
With the spirit's story told and its angst expressed through music, it finds peace. David watches as it ascends to the afterlife, knowing he has restored harmony to his community.

ending: And so, David Evans proved that even at 75, one could still make a symphonic difference.
moral: Age does not diminish our ability to impact the world around us; it often enriches it.
